title: Climate at one minute to midnight, says Johnson
content: As world leaders gather for COP26 in Glasgow, Prime Minister Boris Johnson says action is needed.

title: Migrants desperate for help camp on UN's doorstep
content: Thousands of people are on the streets after fleeing overcrowded detention centres in Libya's capital.

title: Macron says Australian PM lied over submarine deal
content: Asked if Australia's leader was untruthful, France's president responds: "I don't think, I know."

title: 'Vax' declared word of the year for 2021
content: The Oxford English Dictionary said the word had made "the most striking impact".

title: Joyful reunions as Australia's border opens
content: International travellers hug loved ones at Sydney Airport for the first time in 20 months.

title: NZ bat flies away with bird of the year award
content: The win, seen by some as a much-needed PR victory for bats, has ruffled feathers among bird-lovers.

title: Thailand reopens to tourists from over 60 nations
content: Authorities hope reopening will generate $30bn for the tourism sector despite ongoing restrictions.

title: Japan PM Kishida declares victory for ruling party
content: He has defied initial expectations to lead the Liberal Democratic Party to a comfortable majority.

title: UK and France blame each other over fishing row
content: Johnson says Macron should "de-escalate the rhetoric" and Macron says the "ball is in Britain's court".

title: UK passengers hurt in two-train crash
content: It is thought about 17 people are injured and a train driver was trapped.

title: Extreme weather events are 'the new norm'
content: Scientists from the WMO say global warming is leading the world into "uncharted territory".

title: G20 pledge climate action but make few commitments
content: The agreement between the world's richest economies makes no reference to cutting emissions by 2050.

title: Man in Joker costume injures 17 in Tokyo attack
content: Video footage shows passengers desperately running from fire and the man who was wielding a knife.

title: One dead in Czech cable car crash
content: The incident at a popular tourist site happened when one cabin came loose from its cable and fell.
